entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
